problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,点D,E分别在边AB,AC上,DE∥BC,已知AE=6,\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{3}{4},则EC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, the vertices D and E are on the edges AB and AC respectively, DE ∥ BC, it is known that AE = N_0, \frac {AD}{BD} = \frac {N_1}{N_2}, then the length of EC is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理,找准对应关系是解题的关键．
